column2: "...Hey, are you really with ARKS?"
"I mean, ordinary members aren't allowed around these parts."
"At first I thought you were here on orders, but this kid says you aren't."
"So I'll ask once more - Are you really with ARKS?"
"1. Nod"
"2. Remain Silent"
"You say you are? Hmph. Suspicious."
"Okay, fine. Tell me all you know about ARKS, and I'll believe you!"
"It should be easy if you're the real deal. I've got all the time in the world!"
"... Or not. Just kidding. I know you're not here to cause trouble."
"I can sense your photons. You're a real ARKS member."
"It was just a test. If you hadn't spoken up, it would mean you had something to hide."
"What, you want to play the silent game?"
"If you're the real deal, then you should be able to tell me all about ARKS! Let's hear it!"

"I... I'm not like the rest of ARKS.
I don't get to socialize much, or talk to anyone."
"You're the first one I've met and spoken to like this. So, I'd like to continue our conversation."

"It's my duty to serve and protect the other members. But, I really
don't know any of them."

"Huh? AGAIN!? Can't I catch a
break!? Unbelievable!"

"Hey, you! The next time we meet
we're going to pick up where we left off! You got that?"
